title: Will grace marks be given if a student needs just 2 marks for passing in the class 12 boards? - Quora
tags: Central Board of Secondary Education, India

response.answer_text: Yes 2 marks can be given as grace marks actually the thing is teacher himself doesn't want to fail any student he tries his best to do liberal marking If there is 4 or 5 marks less than passing marks teacher try to give Grace marks so don't worry you will definitely pass All the best Thank you

It usually depends, who is checking your paper. Most people tell that they will give you grace marks, but some teachers don't. If you have passed in all subjects, failed in one( then teacher will decide it, if the marks should be given or not). My friend had flying numbers in all except maths( he failed in maths by 1 mark).
